title: Watch: How the BBC works... in under two minutes
text:
The BBC has been under fire in recent weeks, with controversy leading to the departures of two senior bosses - both the director general and head of news.

It has raised questions about how the corporation should be governed, and reignited a debate about the future of the corporation.

But how is the BBC governed and funded now? Culture reporter Noor Nanji explains.
summary: Culture reporter Noor Nanji explains how the BBC is funded and governed, amid controversy that has lead to the departures of two senior bosses.
